website_summaries.verdict: A hand mixer that comes with  a milkshake maker attachment and good performance on all speeds.
pros: Includes wire beaters, whisk, dough kneaders, and milkshake mixer
Has a pulse and burst function as well as six speeds
Snap-on case big enough to hold all attachments and the cord
cons: The beaters that come with this mixer are a wire style, rather than the heavier duty traditional beaters

customer_reviews.title: Rusted attachments
customer_reviews.text: Hand washed before first use, let air dry and the attachments all rusted. Will be returning this item asap
customer_reviews.author: Anna long

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: This was bought as a replacement for my old mixer. I wanted stainless steal attachments because the old ones beaters started to rust. This has been a great item and all the different pieces of it work well and don’t rust. The container clips into the bottom of the mixer itself which is space saving and convenient. It has a very powerful motor and I was surprised that it was so light to hold. All the features advertised are exactly as represented. I’m very happy with this.
customer_reviews.author: Tonda Southern

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointed with Amazon!!!
customer_reviews.text: I had to wait a couple days to get this product, and I was fine with it. Today (11/13) I got the mixer and I'm really unhappy because the product is clearly NOT NEW. The box showed signals of being opened and the mixer itself had scratches and fingerprints all over it. Under different circumstances I would return the product, but I kept it just becaUse I need it right now.
customer_reviews.author: Leon

customer_reviews.title: Made in China with ZERO Quality Control
customer_reviews.text: The snap on bottom is NEVER GOING TO SNAP ON TO THE MIXER! It's simply NOT THE RIGHT SIZE. I only bought this because of that feature. Then noticed it's made in China where manufacturing specs are iffy WARNING. AMAZON IS MAKING IT EXTREMELY DIFFICULT TO RETURN THIS DEFECTIVE PRODUCT
customer_reviews.author: The Apprentice

customer_reviews.title: Great basic mixer
customer_reviews.text: This mixer has been doing a great job since I purchased it a couple years ago. I like all the attachments and how compact everything is once folded and put back into the gray case that clips into the bottom of the mixer. I've made cakes, cupcakes, mashed potatoes, pavlovas, etc with no issues. If you're an everyday home cook, this mixer will suit you well.
customer_reviews.author: AMG de Wet

customer_reviews.title: love the snap on case that keeps everything tucked away together
customer_reviews.text: I already had 2 good quality hand mixers laying around, but I love the snap on case that keeps everything tucked away together for storage! It takes a tiny bit of practice to get the case to snap on, but it's really not hard & everything fits perfectly, including the cord. I had no problems using this mixer & I liked the way if felt to hold - not too heavy. I would definitely buy this again!
customer_reviews.author: Midwest Mom

customer_reviews.title: Nice space saver and mixer
customer_reviews.text: I live in a small apartment so having appliances that are space savers is a plus in my book. The shipping time was pretty fast (ordered on Thursday and received the following Monday). I’ve used this mixer a few times and it’s done more than I expected to. It mixes really well and because of its size, I was able I store it in a small space in my cabinet. The storage case that attaches at the bottom makes it easy to keep all the attachments together. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey Chase

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with rusted part
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately one of the attachments came rusted. What’s worse is I didn’t notice it until it was too late and it was past the 30 day return. I’m going to try the manufacturer to see if they can help. The pink color is beautiful but unfortunately one of the mixer attachments arrived rusted.
customer_reviews.author: Diamonds and Pearls

customer_reviews.title: The idea for storage is great! The only problem I could find was the ...
customer_reviews.text: This mixer has the power I wanted, also has features at your fingertip on the handle for speed control. The idea for storage is great! The only problem I could find was the storage container will not stay put. Great idea, make it stronger so it can stay attached to the mixer. I have to use the cord to wrap around the whole package to store it away. P. Dawson Mobile, AL
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Dawson

customer_reviews.title: Pure disappointment
customer_reviews.text: I’m so disappointed how this was delivered. Usually it’s in a cardboard box and it was delivered uncovered unsecured and when I opened it it looked used completely and utterly disappointed. It will be returned
customer_reviews.author: P. Iacovitti

customer_reviews.title: Almost the perfect mixer!
customer_reviews.text: I like this mixer a lot. Love the eject lever for the beaters. Love the pulse and the power burst features. The variable speeds are good. I have made 2 batches of rolls with the dough hook and I hope the motor holds up for dough. It doesn't seem to bog down. My dough recipe adds most of the flour while using a mixer, then stir in another 1/4 cup with a spoon. My only complaint concerns the box to hold attachments. It is difficult (but not impossible) to attach it to the mixer - main reason not to give it 5 stars. I love having all the attachments.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: very pretty. Color is NOT as pictured much pinker
customer_reviews.text: Works well, very pretty. Color is NOT as pictured much pinker. I wanted more of a berry color. Don’t think I’ll return though.
customer_reviews.author: K. Perry

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful appliance, and it has so many functions.
customer_reviews.text: I had to base my rating on appearance, since I did not unpack everything, or even plug it in. But from the description, I would say "This one has it all." Even choice of colors, and drink mixer. It never occurred to me that I have become very weak over time, (I have muscular dystrophy). The moment I lifted it out of the box, I knew that my wrist and arm would be too weak to hold it up for very long. So sad to send it back, because it is gorgeous!! it would make a stunning gift, if there were a cook on my gift list!
customer_reviews.author: Little Old Lady from Texas

customer_reviews.title: Broke during fourth use.
customer_reviews.text: It worked. Three times. The fourth time, the wire separated from the post of one beater while I was creaming butter and sugar. Went to the Hamilton Beach website to order a replacement. Out of stock. Apparently, broken beaters are a problem with this mixer. Why beaters aren't standardized for their various hand mixers is a mystery. Aside from that, it's heavy, so could be difficult for some. Cleaning around the chrome plate on the front is a pain. Compared to the $12 mixer it replaced, a fail. Great mixer in concept, but worthless to me now.
customer_reviews.author: Laurs

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Store - Does a Good Job of Mixing
customer_reviews.text: I really like the storage feature which the mixer snaps right into - and I liked the mechanism which makes it easy to release the beaters (unlike others I have had which have had a button very hard to push to release them. The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is that I found it a bit difficult to insert the beaters - the notches have to be exact and it's not as easy as I expected. However, I would order this mixer again, so that's not a big negative.
customer_reviews.author: B. Lambert

customer_reviews.title: It has potential but...
customer_reviews.text: It has potential but the danged bottom part will pop off at the slightest aggravation! You get everything clean and stored in the bottom part then you go to put it in the cabinet and if you hold it wrong or bump *anything* the bottom part will just pop off and dump everything on the floor. Rinse and repeat-- literally. :(
customer_reviews.author: Robert Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Received this smelling of cat urine!
customer_reviews.text: The blender itself was fine, but the box was smashed on one side and was damp. It was in a plastic bag which I thought unusual until I opened the bag and the unmistakable scent of cat urine came wafting out. I wiped down the blender many times and finally got the smell to lighten but it still smells if you put your nose up to it. BLECH...How can Amazon even think this is ok? Blender does feel solid, and comes with great attachments and a nifty storage case. Not sure if Ill return it or just keep washing it hoping the smell goes away.
customer_reviews.author: Coluembe

customer_reviews.title: Cute Green Mixer. did not last. Hamilton Beach does not care.
customer_reviews.text: Mixed a few batches for cookies, and tried the included dough hook for pizza. Motor died straightaway. Contacted Hamilton Beach, they slowly responded with an offer to replace if I covered shipping and handling. Why should I? Pshht.
customer_reviews.author: ed

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great buy
customer_reviews.text: Great product, great buy! I was a little worried after I read some of the reviews about the container part, but figured even if it breaks it shouldn't be that big a deal, I can store things elsewhere. well I am happy to say I've had zero problems with the plastic box attachment! it clicks onto the mixer perfectly and I've used it a few times now always half expecting the latch to break or something, but so far, it's perfect!! The mixer is great too, super powerful and easy to use/ clean. 100% satisfied over here.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Ehrman

customer_reviews.title: Not very durable
customer_reviews.text: We only used this 3 or 4 times and it started smelling like the motor was burning up. Just used on pancake batter. Not very durable. It does have some nice features though, you can stand it up and have the beaters over the bowl while adding more ingredients. It is comfortable to hold. Also the snap/latch on the storage box broke the first time we tried to put it together. Had to store mixer separately from storage box after that.
customer_reviews.author: E. Scott

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive hand mixer that works well.
customer_reviews.text: I like this hand mixer a lot. The clip on container on the bottom is a good way to store all the mixing beaters so you always know where they are. The motor seems to run fine for the first couple things I've made. It's got a pulse button that you can just hold down instead of flicking it on and off if you need to get something small incorporated into your dough. The one draw back is the clip-on container takes a little bit of patience to get on every time. You have to line it up just right, and jam it on there. If it's not right, it will fall off.
customer_reviews.author: Larson

customer_reviews.title: New favorite mixer!
customer_reviews.text: Great mixer. I actually like this mixer better than my Kitchen aid. Works great. Love the extra attachments it comes with. Really like the attachment holder case it comes with. The only thing is, it can be hard to attach the holder to the mixer and get it to lock. Easy to use. Easy to clean. Works beautifully!
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly good hand mixer
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Mashes a 5 -pound batch of potatoes every week, sometimes more, without complaint. A double batch of thick cookie dough gave it a hard time, but it didn't break down. The beater release is the trigger in the handle. It seems like it might be easy to pull it by mistake. Well, in 18 months, that has never happened, so never mind. The storage box underneath is a good idea that does not quite work. It is too cumbersome or awkward to use. I keep the beaters in it, but it winds up next to the mixer on the shelf, not neatly attached to the mixer. It is still going, we are happy with it for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Lightning1

customer_reviews.title: Not purple n pretty ugly, but does what it promises.
customer_reviews.text: The mixer has all the features stated. There is only one problem. ITS NOT PURPLE!I ordered purple, the box indicates that it's purple, but the mixer is actually apretty heinous reddish color. Not so good. Not having red as a color option tells me that the manufacturer doesn't know what purple really looks like. All that being said, it performs as promised, but must use up valuable cupboard space as its just to ugly to leave out on the counter with the other purple kitchen small appliances.
customer_reviews.author: Leeto

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The mixer splatters ingredients all over the bottom of the mixer and around the bowl. The whisk is not very effective at beating egg whites even at the top speed. The milkshake mixer seems ok, but I bought it for mixing and whisking, which it doesn't do very well. Very disappointed because I have other Hamilton Beach appliances that I love.
customer_reviews.author: SilverFox

customer_reviews.title: I like this mixer very much
customer_reviews.text: I like this mixer very much. I've used the whisk attachment and the beaters, both work fine. I like that the speed varies from slow to very fast. I used my last beater for more than 20 years, so I'm thrilled with the difference between the old and the new. I like that all the attachments fit in the plastic case on which the beater sits. It's easy to story and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Low Bow

customer_reviews.title: Alot of Fun to Use
customer_reviews.text: I really like this mixer. I bought the green one for a birthday present to me after my 2 year old Cuisinart quit. I could not wait to try it so, i whipped up a batch of cookies. I like the way it feels and the power it has. No issues with splattering at all. It is very well behaved. The mixer plows through cookie dough and you feel in control. It's alot of fun! And the Green looks so retro. yes, I would recommend this to someone. And if it lasts longer then my Cuisinart I will be thrilled.
customer_reviews.author: diane lake

customer_reviews.title: A better option if available
customer_reviews.text: Low quality. The item I received was bought new but was clearly a used return. Covered in scuffs and smelled of burning motor when turned on. A better option if available.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah+Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Broken and will not hold one of the mixing wands
customer_reviews.text: Today marks almost 11 months having the hand mixer. something on the inside broke and will no longer hold one of the mixing wands. I cannot use this product anymore. And I'm eating it two stars because I cannot love something that I cannot use.
customer_reviews.author: Lorelikun

customer_reviews.title: When mixing any kind of powder like flour or powdered sugar she can use the pulse ...
customer_reviews.text: Wife loves the pulse function. When mixing any kind of powder like flour or powdered sugar she can use the pulse feature to slowly mix the ingredients without throwing them out of the bowl. Once they are blended enough she is able to go to higher speeds without throwing flour or powdered sugar all over the place. Other mixers on the lowest speed even though they were very slow would still throw flour and sugar out of her mixing bowl. The pulse function eliminates this problem by TAPPING the pulse feature (not holding it down) until it is mixed enough to turn it to higher speeds. Way to go Hamilton Beach!
customer_reviews.author: George Goehring

customer_reviews.title: Check the storage box.
customer_reviews.text: Llike the mixer and the attachments however it does not snap onto the storage box. The back goes in correctly but the front of the plastic case isn’t long enough to snap over the front. If you try to pick it up it all falls open.
customer_reviews.author: Drena L. Stjohn

customer_reviews.title: Cover does not stay closed
customer_reviews.text: After several times of use, while making cake batter, it started to smell like electrical burning. I thought it was a goner, but after subsequent uses it was fine. However, the cover does not stay on. I called to ask about it and was told that some of them do not hold tight and I have one of them. Nothing you can do. No offer to do anything. I thought the storage cover was a neat feature. Oh, well.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Works great, looks good. Haven't used on really thick batter yet, but I'm very pleased with the bread, cookie, and cream cheese recipes I've made thus far.
customer_reviews.author: MyMy

customer_reviews.title: Beater attachment won't stay in on the right side
customer_reviews.text: This isn't a terribly powerful mixer, but it was getting the job done for what we needed. Then after a month or two of use, the right side (as you hold it) attachments would fall out. We have to keep constant contact with the bottom of the mixing bowl or the right side beater attachment will come out.
customer_reviews.author: J Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Missing accessories, Amazon wouldn't help - told to contact manufacturer - they didn't help!
customer_reviews.text: Item worked fine but was missing accessories. Amazon associate said they couldn't help and that I needed to contact the manufacturer. Manufacturer wouldn't help since item was used and warranty had expired on item serial number. I won't buy used from Amazon again!
customer_reviews.author: C. Peters

customer_reviews.title: So disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: My old Hamilton Beach mixer was much better. The lever controlling the speed can easily be engaged accidentally when you're setting the mixer aside. This happened to me launching batter in every direction before I could turn it off. The case that holds the attachments just barely holds them along with the electric cord. Once again my old Hamilton Beach was designed better in the storage compartment. So disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Granny's Purse

customer_reviews.title: Perfectmixer for all of your kitchen needs!
customer_reviews.text: This multi function mixer is my all time favorite utensil in my entire kitchen. I bought it as I really started to delve into cooking family meals and special occasion dinners to avoid buying a huge heavy mixer or having to make due with hand mixing. It is the perfect blend. The different attachments handle all of my baking needs and I love this mixer. I purchased one shortly after for my mother in law who is older and can no longer use her heavy Kitchen Aid mixer. This hand held is perfect for anyone.
customer_reviews.author: JENCARPENTER33

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed...
customer_reviews.text: I am really disappointed in this product. I bought it last year and this was only my fifth time using it. It made a weird sound and then made the awfulest smell. It stunk up the whole apartment. I'm really disappointed in this since it started out great. However, I only used it 4 or 5 times and still the product and box looks new and it mixer burned out on such a short use.
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie C.

customer_reviews.title: Overheats on Egg Whites
customer_reviews.text: This hand mixer doesn't have the power I need. I used the Boost button a couple of times when beating egg whites, and the motor got really hot and started smoking. It still works, but I'm looking for a stand mixer with twice the wattage!
customer_reviews.author: Miss M

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I think this thing is great for the money. I have no problems with it and have used it several times now. It may not be a 10 year hold up deal but for the money it seems about right. It doesn't feel or look cheap to me.
customer_reviews.author: crystmith

customer_reviews.title: I had it shipped directly to her and she is in LOVE with this mixer
customer_reviews.text: This I purchased as a gift for my 87 year old aunt. I had it shipped directly to her and she is in LOVE with this mixer. After over 10 years with her previous mixer she was so sad when it died. She bakes every week for the people in her apartment building (over 75 apartments). She is a true gift to everyone
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price. Basic mixer that will get it done!
customer_reviews.text: Good for the price. The holes where the mixers are inserted is too open and the mixers have short shafts so the batter will easily touch the underside as your mixing and works it’s way into the holes. Makes it hard to clean ... otherwise I like the included attachments. It stores together nearly!
customer_reviews.author: Mic

customer_reviews.title: Love this mixer
customer_reviews.text: Love this mixer. The storage case is excellent. It's compact design saves storage space. you are able to rest the mixer on the bowl as well. The attachments are regular beaters, whisks, and a bread hook. Would recommend this mixer.
customer_reviews.author: LB1822

customer_reviews.title: Cheap it broke first time using
customer_reviews.text: It broke the first time i used it one of the moxing attachments broke
customer_reviews.author: tiffany w.

customer_reviews.title: Great price. For the quality
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I were looking for a cake mixer without spending an arm and a leg. We went to Kohl's and found this Hamilton Beach mixer without all the add-ons for double the price. While I was in the store I looked this up and found the price to be more budget friendly. Purchased it on Amazon before even leaving the store.
customer_reviews.author: S H

customer_reviews.title: Great features works smoothly
customer_reviews.text: I have really loved this blender. Before buying this I tried a friend's blender (kitchen aid I think?) and even in a deep mixing bowl it flipped up ingredients everywhere. This blender does not. I love the variety of attachments, I love the bowl rest notches in the body of the blender and I love the storage case. Its high speed was great for whipping cream. The only thing that I don't like is that it switches on so easily that I've accidentally switched it on a couple times while not intending to (luckily I have so far not made a huge mess).
customer_reviews.author: Taunya L.

customer_reviews.title: Good mixer but poor button placement.
customer_reviews.text: This is a really good mixer but the location of the on/off switch is poorly placed. I’m constantly turning it on accidentally. It’s way too easy to bump and turn the beaters on. Which usually either means a huge mess as batter flies all over or they damn near take a finger off. The burst button is nice and does help with mixing. I like the release for the beaters and the storage is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Robertson

customer_reviews.title: didn't realize how easy that would be
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this because of its compact design. All the accessories fit into the base. The problem is that the plastic base was indented and would not cover anything. I wrote to the company and asked for a replacement and that I would pay for it if necessary. No response. I should have returned the product but being rather new to Amazon, didn't realize how easy that would be.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the Hamilton beach hand mixer. I have made everything from whip cream to bread the mixer powered thru it all. The things I didn't like was the beater release was under the handle and gets in my way of holding the mixer, and I can put the mixer in it's case
customer_reviews.author: Clarice Miceli

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: It seemed like a great deal, especially because of the different beaters and storage drawer. My last Hamilton Beach hand mixer lasted for a long time, so I am somewhat loyal to the brand. Unfortunately, this was a disappointment. It feels flimsy, is very noisy, vibrates excessively, is awkward to hold, and the storage drawer fell off; the unit I received had a few scratches and looked as if it had been used (food stuck on it) right out of the box. I ended up returning it and purchasing an OXO for about $10 more instead (which I am extremely happy with). As always, Amazon stood by me and promptly issued a refund.
customer_reviews.author: R. Palermo

customer_reviews.title: Not the greatest storage holder.
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping this would be similar to the one I was replacing it with. It is extremely difficult to get it back into the holder. My last one snapped right in with no problems. This one I have had for several months and I've never been able to get it to attach correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: Old design was more user friendly beware of slide settings
customer_reviews.text: I like the storage capability however it is sometimes difficult to snap together. There are a few things that should be changed in the design for safety. The release is on a finger trigger under the handle. The speed slide moves too easy and slides back for a pulse. It moves too easily and can cause injury. I will not let my 9 year old operate this mixer. The open end handle makes it harder for alternate hand positioning.
customer_reviews.author: J. Sanderson

customer_reviews.title: Convenient, happy with it.
customer_reviews.text: I like it. The snap kit is very convenient, the mixer is easy to use and does everything you'd want it to. The only thing keeping it from 5 starts is that there's no place for the cord, so just like any other hand mixer you have to wrap it around the body of the mixer and the snap case. Sort of thought since there was a snap on storage kit that it would take care of the cord too. My bad for assuming. One of the best hand mixers I've had. Really like the additional dough hook and wisk that were included and appreciate the power burst button. Would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia Donnell

customer_reviews.title: It is not worth the free shipping.
customer_reviews.text: This has to be the most toylike pice of Chinese crap I've seen in a long time (apart from actual toys). I'm not even going to give it the respect of returning it, but will just throw it in the trash where it belongs. I can't believe the waste the time to package this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great Mixer.
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work very well. Enough attachments to do everything I need it to do. Nice to have the storage area underneath. Compact design.
customer_reviews.author: Eric G.

customer_reviews.title: A must have for any kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Great product when you need a hand mixer verses a full size mixer. My favorite thing about my mixer is that it has a storage compartments so you keep everything together in one place! Would highly recommend and buy again for a gift!
customer_reviews.author: Diana L Durdin

customer_reviews.title: Not sure?
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure about this product? It is a bit clunky for lack of better word. It’s a little bulky and Boxee. The attachments do you have a case which snaps on. The color is great it works OK nothing spectacular. If I have the time energy and willpower I would’ve returned it.
customer_reviews.author: regina u.

customer_reviews.title: I also love that you can store everything together in the
customer_reviews.text: Works well for multiple uses, I've made dough using the dough hook, macaroons using the whip attachment, and the beaters for just about everything else! I also love that you can store everything together in the lid
customer_reviews.author: Michelle S.

customer_reviews.title: good for price
customer_reviews.text: works well. love the milkshake tool. main complaint is the cord fitting in the storage. stiff cord fights you when keeping it in case while lining up slots to clip base on. i just took out tools to make more room. i think this could be redesigned. still happy for the price. pulse is nice. 1st speed is slow enough.
customer_reviews.author: dp

customer_reviews.title: Awful mixer
customer_reviews.text: I will keep it because I will rarely use it but there is a small piece missing from one of the beaters & I just don't like the way it operates.
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: Not a good mixer for baking
customer_reviews.text: It was a nice deal got it for my sister as a Christmas gift but she told me after using it a couple of times there's this burning smell like the moter in it is going. It doesn't like mixing things at high speed if you do a lot of baking do not get.
customer_reviews.author: Angel_fire

customer_reviews.title: What a piece of crap
customer_reviews.text: 5 stars on the features yet a one star review? Had this for about 18 months; 6 months ago the switch started acting erratically. It won't hold it's place and you have to keep jiggling it to get it on the speed you want. Virtually useless after about a year of light use. This one is going in the trash which is where it belongs.
customer_reviews.author: golfdoug

customer_reviews.title: Nice easy hand mixer
customer_reviews.text: Really good standard hand mixer. It has a good power to it and the storage bin is actually pretty convenient. I thought we would just be tossing that part away, but it is handy. It is easy to handle and doesn't jerk when you punch it on high.
customer_reviews.author: Vegas Strong

customer_reviews.title: Good product for good price.
customer_reviews.text: Very good product for a nice price. Kneading and beating is done well. But making frosting kind of texture doesn't happen very well.
customer_reviews.author: Customer review

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: So far I love it. I like having the different attachments. The release trigger is so much better than the old release buttons. The pulse speed is fantastic. I have used this product for cookies, cake, and shredding chicken so far and would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is a powerful hand mixer. I had no trouble with snapping the mixer back onto the storage box. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Linann

customer_reviews.title: Not Recommended
customer_reviews.text: The wire beaters rusted after a few uses and hand washing only, so I'm going to have to buy another one. Also, as other reviewers have mentioned, the storage compartment does not stay attached to the body of the mixer.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this mixer! The only tiny problem is the storage attachment is a little difficult to lock into the bottom of the mixer but it's not a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Beth hostelley

customer_reviews.title: Case can be a proble.
customer_reviews.text: Nice, strong mixer. The case can be a problem since it is very difficult to fit all of the mixers & the cord in it. And the top does not snap on too well. I solved the first problem by removing all but the mixers, since that really is all I use. But the power if the mixer makes up for it.
customer_reviews.author: Jo-Ann M.

customer_reviews.title: Used
customer_reviews.text: This came “new” but with tons of scratches and finger prints!!! Not sure if this was returned and refurbished or what happened?!
customer_reviews.author: Yazmin soto

customer_reviews.title: not purple..
customer_reviews.text: The mixer I chose was purple..but what came is a hot pink...colour not as listed at all. I really dislike pink. Wish I had chosen the blue.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer_Chris

customer_reviews.title: The case doesn't close.
customer_reviews.text: The key feature I wanted was that the mixer stored right on the box, turns out latch doesn't work. Very disappointed. Just missed my window to return it...
customer_reviews.author: My two cents

customer_reviews.title: Good toy for a child under mother supervision
customer_reviews.text: This mixer looks like a child’s toy, it looks cheap and feels cheap, I don’t expect it to last anymore than 4 or 5 uses, as long as I don’t use it for large jobs, and the cover does not go back on once removed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this mixer!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this mixer!! The design is intuitive and user-friendly and the low setting is actually low, which I have never encountered in a hand mixer before. I’m thrilled with my purchase. The eject button for the attachments is like a trigger, which is also really fun for me :) And how fun are those colors?! I got the green one.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Cumings

customer_reviews.title: Handy to use. For kids too. Compartment for attachments.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use clean and store. Attachments and compartment to hold them all. Use for light baking. (Would not hold up to something like divinity. )
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Woody

customer_reviews.title: Good mixer
customer_reviews.text: Power fine but getting beaters in was a struggle. Beaters don't go in easy (warning to fellow people wirh hand problems) If attempting to put beaters with power unit upside down make sure it is not plugged in or switch will engage. I don't use hand mixer much so this is ok.
customer_reviews.author: febequ

customer_reviews.title: SNAP ON CASE DOESN'T WORK TOO GOOD
customer_reviews.text: Overall, the hand mixer works very well. However, the snap case that holds the beaters milkshake rod, and other accessories that came with it never snaps properly. The snap holes don't line up and they keep coming apart no matter how hard you press to make the snap fit. It's a big hassle and I don't recommend it for this reason. I would never buy this model again because frankly, the snap case is defective.
customer_reviews.author: Martha G.

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Not much power. Beaters are thin wires, not strong enough for real beating. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and several attachments
customer_reviews.text: I love the section that snaps onto the bottom of the mixer. In this attached bottom is where all the attachments go and I was completely impressed with all the attachments
customer_reviews.author: Missy

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: This is my second of the same mixer in six months, BUT do not take that as a negative. Quite the contrary. If I had not 0vertaxed the mixer with a heavy dough I would still be using the first one. This mixer has all the features you could ask for and at a very reasonable price. If I did not like the first one I would not have bought the same one for a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Old Guy

customer_reviews.title: Won't last
customer_reviews.text: Used less than 20 times and the beaters just disintegrated. This is not a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: KCNDC

customer_reviews.title: A great product at a great price
customer_reviews.text: A great product at a great price. We use it in our motorhome and its so handy especially with tool storage on the unit.
customer_reviews.author: Jelly

customer_reviews.title: Very durable mixer
customer_reviews.text: It what time for an upgrade. I was looking for a mixer that had a low slow speed and a high Maxpeed. This blender works great and comes with extra attachments and a handy storage case. So you don't have to dig through your utensil drawer.
customer_reviews.author: StarcatcherTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great mixer
customer_reviews.text: Really good mixer. The low is actually a low speed, so no mess whipping out of the bowl. I like all of the attachments too
customer_reviews.author: Chris R.

customer_reviews.title: Love this hand mixer!
customer_reviews.text: The twisted wire beaters are amazing. When mixing cookie dough and cake batter, almost nothing stays on the beaters to be scraped off! I haven't tried the other attachments yet.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Cummins

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy agsin.
customer_reviews.text: The motor is pretty weak, quickly started burning up first time we used it. Also it never quite fits into the lower container.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca T. Munteanu

customer_reviews.title: Stores easily and works great.
customer_reviews.text: This is a handy hand mixer! The attachments fit right in the bottom "holder." And the entire thing fits in my appliance garage. I haven't used the "bread making" attachment, but the others have held up just fine. Good price, good product.
customer_reviews.author: Nah Nah

customer_reviews.title: Very good mixer. Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Very good mixer. Easy to use. It is light and easy to eject the mixers with the pull trigger release. It also looks very nice, it has a retro look. Easiest way to attach the mixer to the storage container is to put the storage container on the table and place the hand mixer on the storage container, line it up and press down until it locks into place. Don't try to do it on your lap otherwise you will have a very hard time trying to get it on.
customer_reviews.author: oneofakine

customer_reviews.title: Nice set
customer_reviews.text: Works well for me. But I'm only using it for light duty stuff, such as beating egg whites.
customer_reviews.author: Xuan Guan

customer_reviews.title: I love it--
customer_reviews.text: I picked it because of the color--but really do like this hand mixer--It is a win-win for me--have it match my kitchen and works great---LTD
customer_reviews.author: Linda T. Donnellon

customer_reviews.title: Good with some flaws.
customer_reviews.text: I love this little mixer. It is great for what I need. There are only two downfalls, the purple is more of a pinkish purple...and leaning towards pink rather than purple. The snap on bottom originally worked. I have had it a little more than a week and used it 3-4 times. The clip no longer stays to the mixer. It isn't a huge deal, but the selling point was a snap on bottom to carry and hold the tools.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley M

customer_reviews.title: Great little hand mixer!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this mixer! I have been using a stand mixer for 15 years (and I still love it too). Some times ya just need to plug er in and do the job and go! This little guy is perfect, and very strong. I really highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: tomatosoupgirl1

customer_reviews.title: Great mixer.
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this little mixer. I especially like the easy storage of attachments. You will not be sorry if you buy it. Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: CAD

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I needed it to replace my life long mixer, and I found this and it is perfect. My only suggestion would be that the wires can be a little thicker.
customer_reviews.author: SM

customer_reviews.title: The dough hook works very well.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived promptly. Easy to store. Compartment for utensils a little small so I removed the whisk to give it a bit more room. Works just fine and I am happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: color
customer_reviews.text: I just received this, I love the color, I have not used it yet, but I am sure it is better than NONE. seems the snap on holder thing, is a little hard to snap. but it looks GOOD.
customer_reviews.author: MsSheila

customer_reviews.title: The mixer itself works great. Awesome accessories and the idea that you can ...
customer_reviews.text: The mixer itself works great. Awesome accessories and the idea that you can store them so easily is great. However, the storage container doesn’t latch onto the mixer very well. The mixer kind of just rests on top.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Fortman

customer_reviews.title: The products work great expect for the whisk.
customer_reviews.text: I had a Hamilton Beach mixer for many years until it hit the dust. Then, I got this one. I have yet to use the dough hooks, but the thicker blender works well. However, I used the whisk once, and it folded on itself, and that piece now lies in the trash. I was looking forward to using an electric whisk, and the whisk was part why I chose this one.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: like it
customer_reviews.text: A bit on the heavy side, but for the price is a good tool to own. Just know its limit, this motor cannot handle certain type of dough. The storage bin is a nice plus.
customer_reviews.author: Cristina

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product so far, I haven't had it long, but I like the color and having the little compartment that snaps on and holds all the pieces and the cord is really helpful in keeping it neat and being able to put it away.
customer_reviews.author: Katalya

product_meta.title: Hamilton Beach 6-Speed Electric Hand Mixer with Snap-On Case, Twisted Wire Beaters, Milkshake Rod, Dough Hooks, Whisk, Green
product_meta.description: Color:GreenThe Hamilton Beach performance hand mixer features twisted wire beaters designed for fast and easy mixing, and less clogging. The mixer has 6 speeds to make easy work of all your recipes, a Quick Burst button, and a pulse function. The mixer comes with everything you need to start mixing. You get 6 attachments and a Snap-On storage case. The attachments include: 2 twisted wire beaters, a milkshake blending rod, dough hooks, and a whisk. A convenient eject trigger makes it easy to remove attachments for cleaning. The pulse function works on the slowest speed for added control and less mess. And the Quick Burst button gives you an extra burst of power when you need it. The mixer has 290 watts of peak power to easily handle every mixing job, Whether you're combining ingredients for your favorite dip, making a batch of homemade cookies, preparing fresh bread dough, or whipping cream to top a delicious pie.
feature_bullets: Beaters designed for fast and easy mixing. Twisted wire beaters are designed to mix faster and clog less so you can tackle any baking recipe.

Snap-on storage case and 6 attachments included: the hand mixer with storage case includes everything you need: twisted wire beaters, a milkshake blending rod, two dough hooks, and a whisk. All the accessories Store neatly in the Snap-On storage case.
6 SPEEDS WITH QUICKBURST BUTTON. This versatile electric hand mixer has 6 different speed options, plus a QuickBurst button for those times when you need an extra burst of power.
Pulse function: pulse on the lowest speed for added control and less mess.

290 watts peak power. This Hamilton Beach hand mixer easily handles every mixing Job, whether you're combining ingredients for your favorite dip, making a batch of homemade cookies, preparing fresh bread dough, or whipping cream to top a delicious pie.
Convenient eject trigger. Attachments easily and quickly eject from the mixer.
